name: Sportslings
description:
Sportslings!

The only game where you can raise vaguely sports-like pets!

Created in 5 days for the Virtual Pets Jam 2022.

  • Play sports (?)
  • Feed pretzels to your friend!
  • Maybe they'll change into something else based on how you raise them!

Progress is saved automatically. Leave your friend up in the background and check on them periodically. How exciting!

To start, type in your pet's name (max 5 characters) and press enter!

In-game icons    
Learn about the vital statistics of your friend

   
Feed your buddy a stadium classic

   
Get your pump on with some kicking

   
Face off in a sport against your evil twin

   
Clean up the field

   
Quick solution if you get sick

   
Turn off the lights if you need a rest

   
If this is lit up, something needs your attention urgently!

Credits:
stumpbeard - code, design, art except where otherwise noted
font is Permanent Marker by Font Design
background edited from original art by Bart Jaillet
music is Wedding Fun by Sir Cubworth via Youtube Audio
sfx from jsfxr
